---
id: client-cancel-recurring-payment-v-2
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Recurring Payment"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Recurring Payments Cancellations, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, this just a suggestion. The client endpoint must accept the recurringPaymentId variable, it can be either on the path or as query parameter."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Recurring Payment"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "patch api-method"
info_path: reference/open-finance/btg-pactual-banking-as-a-service-openfinance
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Cancel Recurring Payment"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/client-implementation/pix/recurring-payments/v2/cancel/{recurringPaymentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to receive Recurring Payments Cancellations, this endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/718406041/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+SV+Pagamentos+Autom+ticos+-+v2.0.0-beta.2), regarding the request, that must be implemented as specified on this Documentation. The path can be parametrized by the client, this just a suggestion. The client endpoint must accept the recurringPaymentId variable, it can be either on the path or as query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"recurringPaymentId","description":"The Recurring Payment Id","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Recurring Payment Cancellation request that will be sent by BaaS to the Client","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"","required":["data"],"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"required":["status","cancellation"],"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"description":"Used to inform which status the payment should be updated.","enum":["CANC"],"type":"string","title":"CancellationStatus"},"cancellation":{"description":"","required":["cancelledBy"],"type":"object","properties":{"cancelledBy":{"description":"","required":["document"],"type":"object","properties":{"document":{"description":"Object containing document information","required":["identification","rel"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"The number of the document","type":"string","title":"Identification"},"rel":{"description":"The type of document (CPF/CNPJ)","type":"string","title":"Rel"}},"title":"Document"}},"title":"CancelledBy"}},"title":"Cancellation"}}}},"title":"PaymentInitiationCancellationRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
